channel.title: Need help
channel.description: How do i add xp to like doors and stuff to add str and so on

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341

@Newb_2341 wrote:

Add a case.
An example

case 299: for( ; ; ) { sendMessage("Owned pls?"); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

This is what I have for my stat training objects:

[code]case 2038: //Attack Dummy SLAYER SKILL IS GLITCHED
if (actionTimer == 0) //When action timer reaches 0, the stuff mentioned below happens.
{
actionTimer = 30; //Forgot XD - Maybe how long between each click in Milliseconds?
sendMessage(“You fight the dummy because you have problems.”); //Message sent when object is clicked
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[0]), 0); //How much exp and for what level
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[9]), 9); //How much exp and for what level
setAnimation(1766); //Animation ID
}
break;

case 377: //Strength Chest
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
actionTimer = 30;
sendMessage(“The chest bites your hands and sucks your blood!”);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[7]), 7);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[13]), 13);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[19]), 19);
setAnimation(1110);
}
break;

case 299: //Defense Hay
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
actionTimer = 30;
sendMessage(“You lose all your cash in the hay!”);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[10]), 10);
addSkillXP((200000*playerLevel[14]), 14);
actionTimer = 55;
setAnimation(439);
}
break;

case 380: //Mage Bookcase
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
actionTimer = 30;
sendMessage(“You study the art of magic”);
sendMessage(“You learn NOTHING!”);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[6]), 6);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[11]), 11);
addSkillXP((200000*playerLevel[15]), 15);
setAnimation(1770);
}

case 2513: //Range Target
case 2514:
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
actionTimer = 30;
sendMessage(“You practice the skill of masturbation”);
sendMessage(“You FAIL miserably…”);
actionTimer = 30;
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[12]), 12);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((200000*playerLevel[16]), 16);
setAnimation(426);
}
break;

case 10726: //Prayer Bones
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
actionTimer = 30;
sendMessage(“You start eating the bones, and somehow you gain prayer XP”);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[5]), 5);
addSkillXP((200000playerLevel[13]), 13);
addSkillXP((200000*playerLevel[17]), 17);
actionTimer = 60;
setAnimation(645);
}[/code]

Find your skills in Client.java somewhere (It’s near the top in mine) and you should find something like that.

Read full topic
